trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The peacekeeper has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the peacekeeper's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally doesn't have the {@condition incapacitated} condition.

action.name: Electrified Mancatcher
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) lightning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the {@condition grappled} condition (escape {@dc 13}). Until the {@condition grappled} condition ends, the target has the {@condition restrained} condition and can't teleport, the peacekeeper can't make Electrified Mancatcher attacks, and the target takes 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) lightning damage at the start of each of its turns.
